mapper.select: SELECT reason, teamname, POSITION, playername, playerid, DATE_FORMAT(createDate, '%Y년-%m월-%d일')createDate, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY playerid ASC) AS ROW FROM expulsion
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO expulsion(reason, teamname, POSITION, playername, playerId, createDate) VALUE (#{reason},(SELECT NAME FROM team WHERE id = (SELECT teamid FROM player WHERE id = #{playerId})), (SELECT POSITION FROM player WHERE id = #{playerId}), (SELECT NAME FROM player WHERE id = #{playerId}), #{playerId}, NOW());
mapper.update: UPDATE expulsion SET name = #{name} WHERE id =#{id}
